name: Chess Way - most popular game
description:
Chess is known as one of the oldest strategy games in the world, and it is a two-player strategy board game played on a chessboard, a checkered gameboard with 64 squares arranged in an 8×8 grid. The game is played by millions of people worldwide, which is believed to have originated in India sometime before the 7th century, reached Europe by the 9th century, then all over the world!

We believe Chess Way absolutely is one of best chess app worldwide, and it has be designed for both beginners and advanced players, and has beautiful graphics and rich useful features. Especially it recommend many good endgames and game replays. Whether you'd like to relax or improve your chess skill! Get a small stimulating break or clear your head with Chess Way. On the way to work, before sleeping..., please enjoy the happy time from Chess Way!


Main Feature
1. Five play levels, designed for beginners to super master
2. Powerful Hint function, find the best move easily
3. Solve 50000+ chess puzzles, easy to improve your level
4. Keep the newest Chess game PGN updated every month
5. Designed for multi-mode, one player, two players, solve puzzle, study PGN.
6. Copy your PGN to app from your computer, study PGN everywhere

More useful feature
- Daily puzzle recommendation
- Provide answer for difficult puzzles
- Switch black and white side
- Design the chess board freely
- Indefinite take-back function
- Load/Save game files & PGN Export.
- Designed for both Tablet and Phone
- Five Chess board themes

Finally, appreciate for your playing Chess Way App! Welcome your coming to chess world!
